title: [FINISHED!] Time to meet your Nemesis!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ARzWrF1.jpg

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

It was incredibly fun to play with everyone!  We all had a great time and faced some awesome team comps!  PS vs Community is now at a 1-1 for an event, and we will be doing another event soon for a much anticipated tie-breaker!

Hope everyone met their Nemesis! :D

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 3 victory over to Player Support winning the 2-1 set!**

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

MVP:  **Azler!**  Coming in with those OP ults! {{champion:30}} 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

***[4:44]*** Game 2 finished!

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png

Community roaring back and making it a 1-1 tied set!

MVP:  **Yezarul**!  Bears...still the number one threat!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game 1!

***[3:53pm]***

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

Player Support successfully fended off the Yordle invasion!

MVP:  **BroderickT, Prandine, Salty Kappacino, and FrigidVegence!!!**  Even with a DC, they stayed and tried their hardest!  Serious props to all of you!  :)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Ahh yes, Nemesis Draft. Forcing us to expand our champion pool one game at a time...*

Many of us in PS have been practicing our Nemesis skills (AD Twisted Fate *where?!*) and it’s time to challenge the community to a rematch; we dare you all to do your worst!

Tomorrow, Feb 19th, look for the **PS Challenge Mode Activated** game lobby from 3:00pm - 6:00pm PST.  We will update this thread with the password to the lobby before each game, along with results and the community MVP!

Bring your best Urgot skills, and we’ll bring our best flash-ult Galio skills!  See ya then! ^.^

replies.body: Hit: AD Zyra is surprisingly powerful!

Hmmm....time to leave a sticky note on my desk....

http://i.imgur.com/BKdJvnM.jpg

:D
Aha.. the second game is freljord theme !

The Freljord totally dominated.  I submit to the will of the winter.

{{champion:34}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:113}}
Curse your luck you went against someone that was Freljord in the last factions arc.
How's the early game shaping up?
it appears to be freljord vs pentakill

Alright community, I'm ready to be given dat Heimerdinger. 
ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ raise your dongers ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ.
Whoops, I accidentally dropped the dongers... Is that bad? Hold on, let me fix these....
*sees room; begins doing nothing else but refreshing this page ever 5 seconds*

It would be nice to do something that showcased for the team's.
IE:
Team Player Support                          
PentaKill!                                                                                  
 {{champion:2}} Sneaky

edit but with the mashup like they show in the tournaments via streams, larger pictures, names underneath yada yada

Edit 2: Link to Game Advanced Details: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1735980684/201207713?tab=overview

For future events, you NEED to stream these matches. There's nothing fun about now having to devote the next three hours to doing nothing but pressing Refresh since there's zero way of telling when new matches will start. :(

We do want to start streaming them!  But we also want to do it the right way, which is why we are holding off for now :(

I am going to do my best to update the title of the thread when new games will be starting for the time being though!
Is there anything like this that's gonna happen on EUW? I wouldn't mind streaming the community side in that if that was the case :p
Would you be streaming from your perspective or would it be a spectator streaming and have others cast the game?
This had better be streamed or at least recorded.
I dare you to give me Evelynn like all the other silly Nemesis I have made ;)
We dare you to give us Twisted Fate!  AD for the win!  :)

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=5eVyyc5E,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-02-19T19:04:00.127+0000)
>
> We dare you to give us Twisted Fate!  AD for the win!  :)

Hah! You think I will fall for your shenanigans, but I see through your ploy.  Even I know that Twisted Fate's ultimate reveals Evelynn from stealth!

Shenanigans?!?!  nahhh......but *secrets* on the other hand...

http://i.imgur.com/wRwrLja.png

Was a fun game! :)
The animals were too wild and won.

GG
- {{champion:28}}
I don't think I was MVP lol But thanks guys! GG, was fun~
GG Everyone! Was a fun game. {{champion:60}}
Sorry to my team for throwing it. V_V
Hope I can get into the next game! :)
Yay, good job community! Now it's time to take the lead over the PS RIoters >:D
I wanna pick up Braum now, that was too fun XD
Love ya Voli
Rude dartagnan leaving. And I wanted to play with a musketeer, too.
Dear Riot, thank you for giving me Ziggs. I'll try to make sure that you regret it ;).
There was no password until it was already started ._.
Crap, I completely forgot that nemesis draft was in a different menu from the normal custom games. LAME.
And here I thought it would be posted IN the thread. Ow.

I..may have been wondering where the games where because I forgot I wasn't on PST anymore.

I blame Arizona being stupid as hell with daylight savings (everyone else is doing it! Let's be different!)
Off at 3:30 - Im in!
Man, I really hope I'm not given darius. Oh boy, what an underpowered champion.
I uhh...I hear Vayne is really bad, but I suppose I'll deal with her if I'm forced onto her...?

Hopefully I can get in on the "fun" here as well also.

P.S. There's already a lobby with the title "Challenge Mode Activated" up right now. Just to be on the safe side, that's not the Riot one right?
awesome!
That sounds AWESOME. I'm ready.
Shadow Isles vs Petting Zoo lol
And it's full...
Was a blast gents :) Voli/Braum double Relic bot lane for the win :)

If I may make a suggestion (in case you're not already going to be doing this), but I think that it would be nice if the results and players from all games be listed in the OP as well for all to see and not just the most recent ones there only. Again, I don't know if you already plan to do this or not, but if not then this is just a little friendly suggestion for you to do there, that's all.
>_< Didn't realize there was a capital on Urgot until my third attempt,oh well.
WTF wheres the password?
It fills too quickly ;(

I'd suggest you all join the "Challenge Mode Activate" chat room so you can discuss strategies and the like beforehand!

Except the Rioters, cheating is bad :P
